# AtmosphereIndexEntry { #atdata.atmosphere.AtmosphereIndexEntry }

```python
atmosphere.AtmosphereIndexEntry(uri, record)
```

Entry wrapper for ATProto dataset records implementing IndexEntry protocol.

Attributes:
    _uri: AT URI of the record.
    _record: Raw record dictionary.

## Attributes

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [data_urls](#atdata.atmosphere.AtmosphereIndexEntry.data_urls) | WebDataset URLs from external storage. |
| [metadata](#atdata.atmosphere.AtmosphereIndexEntry.metadata) | Metadata from the record, if any. |
| [name](#atdata.atmosphere.AtmosphereIndexEntry.name) | Human-readable dataset name. |
| [schema_ref](#atdata.atmosphere.AtmosphereIndexEntry.schema_ref) | AT URI of the schema record. |
| [uri](#atdata.atmosphere.AtmosphereIndexEntry.uri) | AT URI of this record. |
